import React, { useState } from 'react'; // Make sure useState is imported import tinkerImg from '../../Assets/Projects/tinker.png'; import Link from '../../Components/Link/Link'; // Adjust the import path to where your Link component is located import '../style/Case.css'; import problem from '../../Assets/Tinker/problem-image.png'; import solution from '../../Assets/Tinker/solution.png'; function Tinker() { const scrollToSection = () => { document.getElementById('Solution').scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }); }; const handleButtonClick = () => { window.open('https://www.figma.com/file/your-figma-file-link', '_blank'); }; const [content, setContent] = useState('Content for Landlord'); // Initialize with Landlord content const [selectedRole, setSelectedRole] = useState('landlord'); // State to track the selected role const handleLinkClick = (role) => { setSelectedRole(role); switch (role) { case 'landlord': setContent('Content for Landlord'); break; case 'contractor': setContent('Content for Contractor'); break; case 'tenant': setContent('Content for Tenant'); break; default: setContent('Please select an option.'); } }; return (

Tinker

Tinker is a contractor market place that streamline landlords’ contractor search.

Role

Product Designer

Date

Feb-May 2024

Tools

Figma

Pen + Paper

Skills

UI/UX

User Research

Branding

As real estate becomes increasingly popular, many small landlords entering the industry struggle to find reliable contractors quickly, resulting in tenants suffering with their problems for too long.

That's why me and my team created Tinker, an AI-powered marketplace platform that streamlines your search for great contractors.

In the Spring 2024 LavaLab Demo Night, Tinker won won the Best Pitch award after pitching our product to 200+ attendees.

Short on time?

01.

PROBLEM

I've experienced first-hand the frustration that comes with property maintenance.

Both of my parents being landlords, and they rely heavily on word-of-mouth recommendations and had to call around to find reliable contractors. This process is not only time-consuming but also highly inefficient, often leading to chaos and frustration when urgent repairs are needed.

And I know our parents weren't alone with this problem. My team and I ran countless user interviews and found that many new non-commercial landlords go through the same tedious process.

A look into the hectic, multi-step process.

PROBLEM STATEMENT

Property maintenance management is tedious and time consuming.

02.

SOLUTION

Tinker is a marketplace platform that links tenant’s work orders with licensed contractors for efficient property maintenance management.

FEATURE BREAKDOWN

handleLinkClick('landlord')} /> handleLinkClick('contractor')} /> handleLinkClick('tenant')} />

); } export default Tinker;
